description: Error message displayed when it's not possible to save a list
defaultMessage: Could not save filters, please try again

description: Success message displayed when a list is saved
'Save and share' here are in infinitive form - it's a button label, to save the current set of filters applied to a search result as feed filters.
'Save' here is in infinitive form - it's a button label, to save the current set of filters applied to a search result as a list.
Text displayed in the title of a warning box when saving a list related to shared feeds
defaultMessage: Saving changes will update shared feeds:
